name: rexeqi
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)), wceq(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Equality inference for restricted existential quantifier. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
